The method `getCharsetFromContentType` is directly related to the test, as it is the one being called and is expected to handle the input string. The static initializer `<clinit>()` is less likely to be the source of the failure since it only initializes a pattern and does not contain any logic that would affect the test outcome.

1. `org.jsoup.helper.DataUtil:getCharsetFromContentType(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/lang/String;` - This method is directly responsible for processing the input and returning the result, making it the most suspicious.
2. `org.jsoup.helper.DataUtil:<clinit>()V` - This method initializes the pattern used in `getCharsetFromContentType`, but it does not contain any logic that would directly cause the test to fail.
